Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Tracker = Tool.Handle
local TrackerGui local TrackerFrame
local Player local PlayerGui
local Character
local Eggs_Model = Game.Workspace:WaitForChild('Eggs') local LightingEggs_Model = Game.Lighting:WaitForChild('Eggs')
local ToolTip = Instance.new('TextLabel') ToolTip.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25 ToolTip.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) ToolTip.Size = UDim2.new(0, 140, 0, 20) ToolTip.TextColor3 = Color3.new(54/255, 96/255, 191/255) ToolTip.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 ToolTip.Font = Enum.Font.ArialBold ToolTip.Visible = false
local function CreateTrackerGui() local eggsFrame if TrackerFrame and TrackerFrame:FindFirstChild('EggsFrame') then TrackerFrame['EggsFrame']:ClearAllChildren() end
if not TrackerGui then TrackerGui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') TrackerGui.Parent = PlayerGui TrackerGui.Name = 'TrackerGui'
local frame = Instance.new('Frame') frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 650, 0, 340) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -325, 0.5, -170) frame.Name = 'TrackerFrame' frame.Parent = TrackerGui
TrackerFrame = frame
ToolTip.Parent = TrackerFrame
local background = Instance.new('ImageLabel') background.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 background.Name = 'Background' background.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=110700195" background.Parent = TrackerFrame background.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
eggsFrame = Instance.new('Frame') eggsFrame.Parent = TrackerFrame eggsFrame.Name = 'EggsFrame' eggsFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 eggsFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) end
eggsFrame = eggsFrame or TrackerFrame:FindFirstChild('EggsFrame') local rowNum = 1 local columnNum = 0 for _, egg in pairs(Eggs_Model:GetChildren()) do if LightingEggs_Model:FindFirstChild(egg.Name) and not eggsFrame:FindFirstChild(egg.Name) then local eImage = Instance.new('ImageLabel') eImage.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) eImage.Parent = eggsFrame eImage.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 eImage.Name = egg.Name eImage.ZIndex = 5.0 eImage.Position = UDim2.new(0, 35 + (columnNum * 78), 0, 60 + (rowNum - 1) * 75) eImage.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. LightingEggs_Model[egg.Name]['SelectedIcon'].Value rowNum = rowNum + 1 if #eggsFrame:GetChildren()%3 == 0 then columnNum = columnNum + 1 rowNum = 1 end
eImage.MouseEnter:connect(function() wait() ToolTip.Visible = true ToolTip.Text = eImage.Name ToolTip.Position = eImage.Position + UDim2.new(0, 40, 0, 40) ToolTip.ZIndex = 9.0 end)
eImage.MouseLeave:connect(function() ToolTip.Visible = false end) end end end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) PlayerGui = Player:WaitForChild('PlayerGui')
if not TrackerGui then CreateTrackerGui() else TrackerGui.Parent = PlayerGui end end
local function OnUnequipped() TrackerGui.Parent = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
Eggs_Model.ChildAdded:connect(function() CreateTrackerGui() end)
Eggs_Model.ChildRemoved:connect(function() CreateTrackerGui() end)
